mapper.select: SELECT c.cartId cartId, p.name productName, c.bookCount bookCount, (p.price * c.bookCount) totalPrice FROM Product p JOIN Cart c ON p.id = c.productId JOIN Member m ON m.id = c.memberId WHERE m.id = #{id}
SELECT id, password, email, nickName, name, address, inserted FROM Member WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT name productName, price price FROM Product WHERE id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Orders(memberId, productName, address, recipient, orderState, bookCount) VALUES (#{memberId},#{dto.productName}, #{address}, #{recipient}, 0, #{dto.bookCount})
